Title: [ANN] Astoria - CMS+CRM Platform for ICO websites
Body: Hello! We are working on new airdrop for our fans and there will be great new in a few days!   how do you develop it? A week ago we made a release of Astoria.CMS Preview (it is not even alpha version, it is just a preview to see it in action).   Have you reached the target? success I will support you, thanks.  For this moment - no, because of limits for every round of ICO. But we believe, that with ours investors help we'll do it! Thank you so much!

Author: astoria
Title: [ANN] Astoria - CMS+CRM Platform for ICO websites
Body: Astoria BUILD THE FUTURE Astoria is a software complex to start, promote and manage the ICO. We create the platform for you to create future.  Astoria is a software complex to start, promote and manage the ICO. With our services You can create a site with the user's personal cabinet in a few simple steps. The whole procedure takes no more than 30 minutes, and the functionality of the original product will not concede more expensive solutions. Using the tools of Astoria to build their team ICO, save money, human resources and time that you can use to refine your ideas.  USEFUL LINKS  www.astoria.ltd White Paper  WHAT IS ASTORIA? Everything you need for ICO management in one place.  Using our tools and services you will be able to create a unique, beautiful and dynamic website for the holding of the ICO and easily manipulate its contents later without programming skills. You will have the ability to track and analyze user activity on your website and interact with them.  Astoria will do the most of the work for you, in turn, you pay more time for the final product.  Here is Astoria Platform components:  Astroia.CMS  Astoria.CMS offers its user the same features as other well-known systems, but with a great difference: system knows what site you are doing and why, so it offers you only the necessary functions.  Creating a website foundation with Atoria.CMS will look as simple and easy for inexperienced users. This will resemble the process of installing the application on computers running Windows OS.   Astroia.CRM  CRM is for Customer Relationship Management system. Sales managers, account managers and even support department will appreciate the convenience of working with CRM.  Astoria.CRM will be connected automatically to all the websites created by using Astoria.CMS. It means that you will not have to do any connection manipulation with API and additional configuration.   Astroia.Market  Like other well-known content management systems, Astoria.CMS will have its own platform for selling and buying website templates.  Astoria.Market is online store of templates, themes, plugins and other add-ons for Astoria.CMS and Astoria.CRM. As far as these Astoria's components are interrelated, it gives you a possibility of purchasing any virtual goods not only on the shop website, but also in the process of working with CRM or CMS applications.   Astroia.Hosting  Astoria.Hosting - a modern web hosting for your project. On our servers there will be only the most powerful and reliable equipment, so that we can provide your website with maximum productivity and minimal response time.  Our hosting will only work with web applications, created on the Astoria.CMS engine.   TOKENS Digital token APC (Astoria Platform Coin) — is the virtual currency that is used for transactions within the Astoria platform.  As a crypto currency (token), which serves for transactions within the platform, Astoria Platform Coin (APC) is used. Astoria Platform Coins are created on the basis of ETH ERC-20.  With APC, you can: •   Buy templates in Astoria.Market •   Receive revenue from the sales of their products on the Astoria.Market •   Pay for Astoria.Hosting services •   Exchange for other liquid crypts  TOKEN DISTRIBUTION  A total amount of 100,000,000 APCs will be generated. Additional coin emission is excluded.  During the ICO campaign, coins will be distributed as follows: •   The total number of tokens for sale: 65,000,000 APC - (65%). •   Crypto-economic reserve: 20,000,000 APC - (20%). •   Team: 8,000,000 – (8%). Frozen for a year. •   Marketing and bounty: 7,000,000 – (7%).  USE OF PROCEEDS  •   Marketing and advertising - 55% •   Astoria.Hosting hardware - 20% •   Research and development: - 15% •   Office rent and equipment: - 5% •   Third-party software and hardware: - 4% •   Administrative expenses - 1%  FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS  What is Astoria? Astoria is a complex of interconnected software for creating, editing, and supporting ICO campaign.  Why do I need Astoria? Using the Astoria You will have more time to develop the product, because you won't spend it on the service website. In addition, Astoria is very convenient, because everything is right at your fingertips!  How much does it cost to use the Astoria? You don't need to pay for use of the software and services of Astoria, but we charge 1% of the amount of all funds raised by ICO campaigns created on our platform. In addition, we take 1% of issued tokens that distribute tokens between the owners of the APC. As a result, you don't have to pay anything until the beginning of the ICO.  Can I use Astoria.CMS for creating a portfolio website? Yes, you have such opportunity. But before You start, make sure that the store Astoria. Market has all the necessary plugins. Yet, we suggest you to use Astoria.CMS only for its intended purpose.  I am developer. Can I create templates for Astoria.CMS and sell them? Yes of course. But note before adding Your template or other digital goods in the shop, we check for compliance with the requirements and the absence of malicious code. Therefore, You may be denied in placement positions in Astoria. Market.  How can I be sure that the number of my sold goods will not be altered downwards? The authenticity of all transaction is confirmed by the entire network, as they are recorded in the blockchain. It's impossible to change or remove at all any transactions.  How to buy tokens Astoria Platform Coin? Selling of Astoria Platform Coin (APC) tokens will occur in three stages: Pre-Sale, Pre-ICO and ICO. For the whole duration of the sales there will be sold 65 000 000 APC (65% of the total amount of all existing APC). To buy you need to register on the website www.astoria.ltd in Your personal account click on «Buy APC» and follow the instructions.  Will I be able to buy tokens after ICO? You will have this possibility only after the release of APC on crypto currency exchanges. Also, if all the APC will be sold before the end of the timing of sales – the additional APC will not be sold!  Why can't I pay for digital goods with a different currency? Limitation on transactions only with the help of APC is made for security purposes and to ensure the currency growth in value.  SOCIAL LINKS  Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Telegram | Medium

Our use of proceeds has 55% for marketing, so after ICO ends, there will be Astoria advertising, not ICO campaign...  This is our strategy, maybe it not the best, but we got to try it
